statements: SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000
SELECT product_id, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30'
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE customer_id = 12345
SELECT transaction_id, sale_amount FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_amount
SELECT customer_id, sale_amount, product_id FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE product_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND sale_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY sale_date ASC, customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_sales > 2000 ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(sale_amount) AS avg_sale_amount FROM sales_data GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(sale_amount) < 500 ORDER BY customer_id;

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT customer_id) AS unique_customers, MIN(sale_date) AS first_sale_date FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 500 GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY unique_customers DESC, first_sale_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT transaction_id, product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount, sale_date FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_reporting WHERE reporter_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY report_date ASC;

SELECT report_id, reporter_name, total_sales FROM sales_reporting WHERE total_sales < 5000 ORDER BY reporter_name ASC;

SELECT customer_id, sale_amount FROM sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000;

SELECT order_id, customer_name, product_name, order_date FROM orders INNER JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id INNER JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id;
